context: Hotel chain with 200 properties evaluating contactless technology implementation post-pandemic to enhance guest experience and operational efficiency

request.purpose: Implement contactless check-in, room access, and payment systems across all properties
request.justification: Guest demand for touchless experiences, 20% increase in contactless bookings, competitive advantage

decision_process.outcome: 85% guest satisfaction increase, 15% faster check-in times
Approved for full rollout with 12-month implementation

business_impact.expected_outcome: Enhanced guest safety and convenience, operational efficiency improvements
business_impact.projected_value: $4,200,000 annual savings through reduced labor costs

lessons_learned: Pilot programs essential for validating technology investments, comprehensive training critical for successful adoption
